interpretation:
The Construction card represents the process of building and progress. It signifies the idea of laying a foundation for something new, whether it be physical or metaphorical. However, this card can also indicate potential obstacles that may hinder progress. The road ahead may be under construction, or there may be a need to reassess plans and make adjustments. 

This card reminds us that development takes time and effort. It suggests that we must be patient and persistent in our efforts to build something meaningful. We must also be willing to adapt to changing circumstances and navigate obstacles as they arise. 

In a reading, the Construction card may suggest that the querent is in the midst of a significant project or venture that requires careful planning and attention to detail. It may also suggest a need to overcome challenges and persevere in the face of adversity.
